product_name: ALPS Mountaineering Diamondback 30 Sleeping Bag - Regular - Special Buy
long_description: The ALPS Mountaineering Diamondback 30 Sleeping Bag uses SkyLoft continuous-filament, hollow-fiber insulation that's highly compressible, lofty and light for comfort on 3-season backpacking trips. Overlapping shingle construction helps eliminate cold spots to keep you warm at night. Rated to keep you warm down to about 30degF for use in spring, summer and fall. Full-length zipper. Nylon ripstop exterior is lined with soft polyester. The ALPS Mountaineering Diamondback 30 Sleeping Bag includes a compression stuff sack. Special buy.
short_description: The ALPS Mountaineering Diamondback 30 Sleeping Bag uses SkyLoft continuous-filament, hollow-fiber insulation that's highly compressible, lofty and light for comfort on 3-season backpacking trips.
